Schloss Schönbrunn
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Aman, Johann (Austrian architect, active 19th century) [work]
Fischer von Erlach, Johann Bernhard (Austrian architect, 1656-1723) [work]

Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Palace in its present form was commissioned from Fischer von Erlach by Leopold I in 1687 and built 1696-1711. Renovated and extended 1743-1749 by Nikolaus Pacassi; renovations continued 1750-1762 and 1769-1777; facades renovated 1817-19 by Johan Aman. Became property of the Austrian Republic 1918 and preserved as a museum. [work]
